approval_data.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks

requirements.title: Create Task
requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task by providing a text description.

requirements.title: View Task List
requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all created tasks to the user.

requirements.title: Application Load Time
requirements.description: The application shall load within 3 seconds on a standard internet connection (e.g., 10 Mbps download speed).

requirements.title: Secure Data Storage
requirements.description: The application shall store user data securely, protecting against unauthorized access and data breaches.
